products.name: Frog Saddle
products.description: Add a modern touch to your Frog bike with Sport saddle with cool yellow frog splat logo.

products.name: Frog Crank Set
products.description: Replacement crank sets for Frog Bikes. Crank set includes chain ring with integrated drive side crank arm and the non-drive side crank arm.

products.name: Frog Helmet
products.description: This green Frog Helmet looks perfect to complete your bike gear

products.name: Frog Shoes
products.description: This shoe one of the most popular shoe choices in the professionnal peloton. No wonder - it serves it's purpose perfectly and is extremely comfortable.

products.name: Frog Water Bottle
products.description: A 16 oz BPA free water bottle with the famous bright green splat logo on one side, and non-slip finger grips on the other.  It has a non-drip one-way valve so it can easily be used with one hand.

products.name: Frog Pedals
products.description: The Frog Composite BMX Pedals features a huge (115x105 mm) super grippy platform with 10 rear-loading steel pins per side to keep your feet planted on even the roughest of trails.

products.name: Frog Chain
products.description: Teflon coated single speed BMX chain for Frog Bikes. It comes with a pre-installed master link and half link in order to fit as well.

products.name: Frog MTB
products.description: This Hybrid Bike is the ideal multi-purpose bike.

products.name: Frog Hybrid
products.description: This mountain bike is the ideal multi terrain bicycle for off-road cycling.

products.name: Frog Rental
products.description: This rental mountain bike is the ideal multi terrain bicycle for off-road cycling.
